alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 19 at 3:54PM PST until November 21 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel will be hazardous, especially for high profile vehicles. on east-west highways and interchanges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Local gusts to 65 mph possible below the Cajon Pass. Local northeast wind gusts to 70 mph in the Santa Ana Mountain canyons.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
